chatjyuce.title: ChatJyuce
chatjyuce.description: A real-time messaging application with secure authentication and presence indicators. Built with React, Node.js, MongoDB, Socket.io, and JWT, supporting 50+ concurrent users with optimized database queries for improved performance.
highlights: User presence indicators and typing status

wagwan.title: Wagwan
wagwan.description: A full-stack social platform featuring authentication, file uploads, and real-time UI updates. Built with Next.js 13, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, and Prisma ORM, designed for smooth concurrent user interactions.
highlights: Scalable database schemas with Prisma ORM

portfolio.title: My Portfolio
portfolio.description: A modern, responsive portfolio website showcasing my journey from electrical engineering to software development. Built with Astro, React, and TailwindCSS for optimal performance and clean design.
highlights: Responsive design optimized for all devices
